Name: PRE-DARK
checklistText:
1. Check that the flashlight works [F]
2. Cabin Light switch 			- BOTH
3. Photo Lights 				- OFF
4. Red filters on cabin light [Click on the lights]
5. Red scope filter 				- ON
6. Warning lights 				- DIM
7. Thruster warmup procedure
 (a) Go to MP mode (manual thrusters)
      Pitch UP followed by pitch DOWN
      Roll RIGHT followed by roll LEFT
      Yaw RIGHT followed by yaw LEFT

 (b) Go to FBW (Hi and Lo thrusters)
      Short-burst pitch UP and DOWN - full stick travel
      Short-burst roll RIGHT and LEFT - full stick travel
      Short-burst yaw RIGHT and LEFT - full stick travel

 (c) Go to ASCS mode and check for proper attitude
      Orientation and holding within limits

8. After entry into dark side, filters - as desired
